description: This file defines the main application component for a React Native project, including an error boundary component, styling, and rendering of the GameScreen component within the app.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component that catches JavaScript errors anywhere in its child component tree and displays a fallback UI.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.constructor
methods.description: Initializes the ErrorBoundary component with default error state.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: Updates state to indicate an error has occurred.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.componentDidCatch
methods.description: Logs error details when an error is caught.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.render
methods.description: Renders fallback UI if an error has occurred, or the children components otherwise.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that wraps the GameScreen with an error boundary and styles.
